Traits.Name: Scorched Earth
Traits.Description: {Aura:} Whenever one or more {Burn} stacks are applied to an enemy: Breaks 1 {Poise} on them. Triggers up to 5 times per turn.

Skills.Name: Basic Attack
Skills.Description: 2 x 2 damage against target enemy. Generates Fire/Earth Aether.

Skills.Name: Grapple
Skills.Description: 2 x 3 Earth damage against target enemy. {Purges} 1 enemy Aether.

Skills.Name: Ignite
Skills.Description: 3 x 3 Fire damage against target enemy. Applies 2 {Burn} to target enemy.

Traits.Name: Monster Chef
Traits.Description: {On Action}, if the action didn't consume {Cooking} stacks: Applies {Cooking} to self and {Regeneration} to the ally with the lowest amount of {Regeneration}.

Skills.Name: Basic Attack
Skills.Description: 2 x 2 damage against target enemy. Generates Water/Fire Aether.

Skills.Name: Invigorate
Skills.Description: Heals all allies for 6. Applies {Regeneration} to all allies.

Skills.Name: Boiling Soup
Skills.Description: 2 x 4 Water/Fire damage against target enemy. Consume all {Cooking} stacks to apply 4 {Burn} to target enemy for each consumed stack.

Traits.Name: Two Headed
Traits.Description: {On Attack}, if it was this monster’s first {Attack} of the turn: Heals the ally with the lowest health by 5. If it was this monster’s second {Attack} of the turn: Applies {Power} to self.

Traits.Name: Eagle Eyes
Traits.Description: This monster can copy the last 2 enemy {Actions} and use them once.  {On Copied Action}: {Purges} the same amounts and elements of Aether as were spent on the {Action}.

Consumables.Name: Capture Action
Consumables.Description: Crafts a Memento of target staggered monster (if it is not already owned).

Artifacts.Name: Capture Action
Artifacts.Description: Crafts a Memento of target staggered monster (if it is not already owned).
